1001100110001100 1101111110010101 1 -> sum: 0111100100100010, cout: 1
1010111011111101 1011101000100100 0 -> sum: 0110100100100001, cout: 1
1111101011100001 1010001010100011 0 -> sum: 1001110110000100, cout: 1
0100100011100100 1100100011000001 1 -> sum: 0001000110100110, cout: 1
0000110110101010 0001111101111000 1 -> sum: 0010110100100011, cout: 0
1010000010000100 0101101111000010 0 -> sum: 1111110001000110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
